name: sister mildred, S.P.
body: chica, chica! so glad you are enjoying yourself so, and still feeling energetic. please kiss everyone for me. yes, *everyone*. xoxo

name: sister mildred, S.P.
body: keep smiling, chica. closer with every peddle. soon u will be eating mole, and enjoying C.H.E.S.T. big hugs to u and hunter.
